mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product (name, type, price, img) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{price}, #{img})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_product SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, price = #{price}, img = #{img} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_product ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT p.name, p.price, p.img, p.type, c.id as commentId, c.user_id, c.rating, c.comment, (SELECT name FROM t_user WHERE id = c.user_Id) userName, (SELECT COUNT(rating) FROM t_comment WHERE product_id = p.id) as commentCnt, (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM t_comment WHERE product_id = p.id) as avg, (SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM t_order_detail WHERE product_id = p.id) as sells FROM t_product p LEFT JOIN t_comment c ON p.id = c.product_id WHERE p.id = #{productId} ORDER BY c.id DESC
select p.id, p.name, p.type, p.price, p.img from t_product p left join t_order_detail od on p.id = od.product_id group by p.id order by ifnull(count(od.quantity),0) desc;
select * from t_product order by t_product.price asc;
select * from t_product order by t_product.price desc;
select p.id, p.name, p.type, p.price, p.img from t_product p left join t_comment c on p.id = c.product_id group by p.id order by ifnull(count(c.comment),0) desc;
select p.id, p.name, p.type, p.price, p.img from t_product p join V1 on p.id = V1.product_id order by V1.sumRating/V1.cnt desc;
